data.meta_description: no binding - Reclus - Condition: very good - Image Size: 7 1/2 x 5 ins. Overall Size including text and borders : 10 1/2 x 7 Ins. CONDITION: Full page print. Blank on the back. Clear and sharp with beautiful detail. As scanned. This beautiful print would look great matted and framed. Or an art supply store can provide you with a selection of frames for old art treasures. NOTE THE FOLLOWING BEFORE YOU PURCHASE: This is a GENUINE ANTIQUE VINTAGE 1880s PRINT. It is NOT a modern reproduction, ie. a laser scan, photocopy, etc. It is the original from the antique or vintage atlas or book publication. This print was published on the date mentioned, or circa the date mentioned at the top of the page. The print I have for sale, like many antique vintage prints and maps that you see online, originate from an antique vintage book or atlas publication. The publication may not always be known. If you have any questions, emails are welcome. - Escuintla,town of Chiapas in southern Mexico,Antique Historical Print
data.text:
About this Item

Image Size: 7 1/2 x 5 ins. Overall Size including text and borders : 10 1/2 x 7 Ins. CONDITION: Full page print. Blank on the back. Clear and sharp with beautiful detail. As scanned. This beautiful print would look great matted and framed. Or an art supply store can provide you with a selection of frames for old art treasures. NOTE THE FOLLOWING BEFORE YOU PURCHASE: This is a GENUINE ANTIQUE VINTAGE 1880s PRINT. It is NOT a modern reproduction, ie. a laser scan, photocopy, etc. It is the original from the antique or vintage atlas or book publication. This print was published on the date mentioned, or circa the date mentioned at the top of the page. The print I have for sale, like many antique vintage prints and maps that you see online, originate from an antique vintage book or atlas publication. The publication may not always be known. If you have any questions, emails are welcome. Seller Inventory # 21402

Contact seller

Report this item

WE ARE AN ONLINE BUSINESS ONLY and have been selling and collecting antique prints for over 20 years and have a large database of antique and collectible prints.

Visit Seller's Storefront

Seller's business information

Artisans-lane Maps & Prints

BC, Canada

Terms of Sale:

Satisfaction Gauranteed. Postage is extra. We are pleased to accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express or Paypal.

If you are a consumer you can cancel the contract in accordance with the following. Consumer means any natural person who is acting for purposes which are outside his trade, business, craft or profession.

INFORMATION REGARDING THE RIGHT OF CANCELLATION

Statutory Right to cancel

You have the right to cancel this contract within 14 days without giving any reason.

The cancellation period...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Orders are processed and ship within 3 business days.

The shipping prices quoted reflect what we have found to be the average cost. These prices include all packaging and handling which is done with the utmost care. We use foamcore for added protection. There are times when we need to requote shipping as we offer combined shipping charges for multiple items. If you have any questions, emails are welcome. Rest assured we try to get your order to you as quickly as possible.

Shipping speeds are estimates based on the carriers' delivery times and cannot be guaranteed. Due to the recent pandemic we have found shipping to be a little slower than expected due to shortage of staff. If your order will pass through Customs, please expect a delay. Any applicable Customs duties or brokerage fees are the responsibility of the buyer. If local sales taxes apply, or if the order is heavy or oversized and requires additional shipping, we may contact you directly about extra charges.
